search_results.query: row row row your boat lyrics

snippet.title: Q: How can I make multiple activities be in one activity changing only strings?
snippet.description: ", "National Anthem (UK)", "Old MacDonald", "Pizza Hut", "Quartermaster\'s Stores", "Row, Row, Row Your Boat", "Shine Up Your Buttons", "Three Blind Jellyfish", "Underwear", "Valerie … contains a list of songs, and the layout of an individual item when clicked contains a Title (TextView), Lyrics (TextView), a "next_button" button, a "previous_button" button to move between songs …
